text: Arrā wa don'na otoko no karada no naka ni mo 2tsu no shinzō o tsukura renai. Anata gataga,`wagahahano senaka no yōda.' To itte (rien sengen suru) tsuma o anata gata no uminooya to dō ichi ni o tsukuri ni wa nara renai. Mata kare wa anata gata no yōshi o, anata gata no jisshi-tomo nasa renai. Korera wa, anata gataga kuchisaki dake de itta kotodearu. Daga arrā wa shinjitsu o katari, katsu (tadashī) michi ni michibika reru
